title: Im allowed to pick in-rotation champions I dont own?

replies.body:
Hey FNC DerpMid,

Thanks for the report. I've gone ahead and passed this on to the team so they can look into it.

I'm honestly just going to throw this here just because I really want to hear Rito's opinion on this and am hoping someone will see it.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/b1ZoajIm-new-ap-jg-item-my-problems-with-it
